biotools.summary: D4 is a approch of Deep Drug-drug interaction Discovery and Demystification. D4 is a method for predicting drug-drug interactions along with their mechnsims of interaction. It uses 11 different mechanisms at pharmacokinetic, pharmacodynamic, multi-pathway, and pharmacogenetic levels. D4 utlizes a neuro-symbolic deep learning strategies to encode for background knowledge about basic biological processes and phenomena about drugs.
